bug.author: HunterMcGushion
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Description</denchmark-h>
OptPros donâ€™t match with saved results when the space contains multiple Categorical EngineerSteps, wherein a Categorical step that is NOT the last EngineerStep has optional=True In other words, using optional anywhere other than the last EngineerStep causes problems for experiment matching
<denchmark-h:h1>Code to Reproduce Bug</denchmark-h>
from hyperparameter_hunter import Environment, CVExperiment, ExtraTreesOptPro from hyperparameter_hunter import Categorical from hyperparameter_hunter.utils.learning_utils import get_boston_data from xgboost import XGBRegressor
#################### Dummy EngineerStep Functions #################### def es_a(all_inputs): return all_inputs
def es_b(all_inputs): return all_inputs
#################### Environment #################### env = Environment( train_dataset=get_boston_data(), results_path="HyperparameterHunterAssets", target_column="DIS", metrics=["r2_score"], cv_type="KFold", cv_params=dict(n_splits=3, random_state=1), )
#################### Two OptPros With Same Params #################### feature_engineer = [ Categorical([es_a], optional=True), Categorical([es_b], optional=True), ]
opt_0 = ExtraTreesOptPro(iterations=4, random_state=32) opt_0.forge_experiment(XGBRegressor, feature_engineer=feature_engineer) opt_0.go()
opt_1 = ExtraTreesOptPro(iterations=4, random_state=32) opt_1.forge_experiment(XGBRegressor, feature_engineer=feature_engineer) opt_1.go()
# Assert `opt_1` matched with all Experiments executed by `opt_0` assert len(opt_1.similar_experiments) == opt_0.successful_iterations <denchmark-h:h1>Log</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-code>Validated Environment with key: "BqfuzaWOeicbQoF2ew3fALX-y0uU3gDrTvJUdBn3IYI=" Experiments matching cross-experiment key/algorithm: 0 Experiments fitting in the given space: 0 Experiments matching current guidelines: 0 Saved Result Files ______________________________________________________________________ Step | ID | Time | Value | (steps, 0) | (steps, 1) | Hyperparameter Optimization ______________________________________________________________________ Step | ID | Time | Value | (steps, 0) | (steps, 1) | 0 | aeb59130 | 00m05s | 0.60061 | <NONE> | es_b | 1 | ee468eb9 | 00m00s | 0.60061 | <NONE> | <NONE> | 2 | 6cebcb67 | 00m00s | 0.60061 | es_a | <NONE> | 3 | 95039ec6 | 00m00s | 0.60061 | es_a | es_b | Optimization loop completed in 0:00:01.287102 Best score was 0.6006127292026042 from Experiment "aeb59130-8fb2-45b0-b950-febf134b2dae"
Validated Environment with key: "BqfuzaWOeicbQoF2ew3fALX-y0uU3gDrTvJUdBn3IYI=" Experiments matching cross-experiment key/algorithm: 4 Experiments fitting in the given space: 3 Experiments matching current guidelines: 3 Saved Result Files ______________________________________________________________________ Step | ID | Time | Value | (steps, 0) | (steps, 1) | 0 | ee468eb9 | 00m02s | 0.60061 | <NONE> | <NONE> | 1 | 6cebcb67 | 00m00s | 0.60061 | es_a | <NONE> | 2 | 95039ec6 | 00m00s | 0.60061 | es_a | es_b | Hyperparameter Optimization ______________________________________________________________________ Step | ID | Time | Value | (steps, 0) | (steps, 1) | Hyperparameter search space has been exhausted </denchmark-code>
Log shows that "aeb59130" was not a match, whose first step was nothing, followed by an actual function
